resources.string: I have read and accept the terms and conditions\n
You need to accept Terms and Conditions
Are you sure you want to permanently delete your user\'s account and loose all your modified recipes? \nThis cannot be undone

LEGAL NOTICE

Owner: LetsGetCactus
 Trade name: Cocina con Catalina
Contact email: info.letsgetcactus@gmail.com
 Headquarters: Spain

This legal notice regulates the use of the mobile application Cocina con Catalina (hereinafter, the App), owned by LetsGetCactus. Access and use of the App imply full and unconditional acceptance of this Legal Notice. If the user does not agree with these conditions, they must refrain from using the App.

The Owner reserves the right to modify at any time the presentation, configuration and contents of the App, as well as the conditions required for its use.

PRIVACY POLICY

1. Data controller
LetsGetCactus. Contact: info.letsgetcactus@gmail.com. Location: Spain.

2. Personal data collected
The App collects the following data:
- Name
- Email address
- Password (stored in encrypted form)

Optionally, in the future other data may be requested such as profile picture or user-generated content (recipes, ratings, comments, etc.).

3. Purpose of processing
Personal data is used to:
- Create and manage the user account.
- Allow access to personalized features.
- Enable participation in the App (publish or rate recipes).
- Send notifications or communications necessary for the service.
- Improve the user experience and service quality.

If payment services are added in the future, the processing of payment data will be clearly explained.

4. Legal basis for processing
- User consent.
- Performance of the contractual relationship (use of the App).
- Compliance with legal obligations.

5. Data retention
Data will be retained while the account is active or as necessary to fulfil the purposes described. The user may request deletion of their account at any time.

6. Data disclosure
Data will not be disclosed to third parties except when legally required or when necessary for service provision (for example, storage or email providers). In such cases, those third parties will act as data processors in accordance with the GDPR.

7. User rights
The user may exercise the rights of access, rectification, erasure, objection, restriction and portability by contacting: info.letsgetcactus@gmail.com.
They may also file a complaint with the Spanish Data Protection Agency.

8. Data security
Data is stored using appropriate technical and organizational measures that guarantee confidentiality and security, including password encryption.

9. Minors
The App is intended for users aged 14 or older. In the case of younger users, parental or guardian consent will be required.

COOKIES POLICY

The App does not use third-party cookies or tracking technologies for advertising purposes. It may only use strictly necessary technical cookies to ensure the correct functioning of certain internal services, such as session management.

If additional cookies are incorporated in the future (analytics, preferences or advertising), explicit user consent will be requested and this policy will be updated.

TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF USE

1. Purpose
These Terms regulate access to and use of the Cocina con Catalina App and the responsibilities arising from its use.

2. Registration and user account
To access certain features, the user must create an account with accurate information and maintain the confidentiality of their password.

3. User-generated content
The user may publish, modify or rate recipes. They declare that they own the rights to the content posted and authorize LetsGetCactus to display it within the App.
The Owner may remove inappropriate, offensive or rights‑infringing content.

4. Intellectual property
All intellectual property rights over the App, its design, code and original content belong to LetsGetCactus or its licensors. Copying, distributing or modifying without authorization is prohibited.

5. Functioning and availability
Continuous availability of the service is not guaranteed, but interruptions will be minimized and regular updates maintained.

6. Third‑party links
The App may include links to third‑party sites over which the Owner has no control or responsibility.

7. Paid services
If payment or subscription services are enabled in the future, prior notice and explicit user consent will be required.

8. Limitation of liability
Use of the App is the user’s responsibility. LetsGetCactus will not be responsible for damages arising from misuse or from content posted by users.

9. Modifications
The Owner may modify these Terms at any time. Continued use of the App after such modifications implies acceptance.

10. Applicable law
This contract is governed by Spanish law. Any dispute will be submitted to the courts of the user’s city of residence.
